channel.title: Greater Things Worship Podcast
channel.description: We talk about what is on our heart as it relates to worship & community. We also use this time to share worship songs that we are working on as well as the process of creating those songs from start to finish.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Sunday Night Videos
channel.itunes:author: Sunday Night Videos
channel.itunes:summary: We talk about what is on our heart as it relates to worship & community. We also use this time to share worship songs that we are working on as well as the process of creating those songs from start to finish.

item.title: Episode #4 - Creativity in Worship - GreaterThingsWorship.com
item.description: This week we discuss creativity in worship and how we all can benefit from collaboration. We also bring back another old song that we started working on a few years ago. We hope to share this song in a few weeks in a more developed way. At least that is the goal ;) http://www.greaterthingsworship.com
item.dc:creator: Sunday Night Videos

item.title: Episode #3 - The Father Heart of God - GreaterThingsWorship.com
item.description: We share on our experience in understanding the Father heart of God in worship & Fred finishes with an acoustic version of "Fathers Smile" which is a song on our Cd. (Available for free on http://www.greaterthingsworship.com )

item.title: Episode #2 - The Presence of God in Worship - GreaterThingsWorship.com
item.description: This week we talk about the presence of God in worship & we end with a new song that we are working on about this topic.
item.dc:creator: Sunday Night Videos

item.title: Episode #1 - Sunday Night Videos Intro - GreaterThingsWorship.com
item.description: A big thank you to all who have supported us with the Greater Things CD. We also talk about our desire to communicate with you about worship, community, song writing etc.
item.dc:creator: Sunday Night Videos
